Row.Text: Automatically find and join a Pirates game.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Pirates is Civilization VI's spin on Sid Meyer's Pirates. Play as a swashbuckling pirate vying for supremecy on the seven seas.
Pirates games are not available while Steam is offline.
View a quick tutorial on Pirates.
Welcome to Pirates. Be a pirate and do pirate stuff while pirating to be the best pirate.
Pirates pirates pirates, pirates. Pirates! Yarrrrrrrrrrrr!
Some general overview about the different scoring categories and how to score.
More details about the specific stuff like treasure fleets, infamous pirates, treasure maps.
Details about your flagship, losing it causes defeat. Talk about mutiny here?
Talk about the new and unique actions you can do as a pirate ship.
